Package businesslogic

Class ProductBLL

java.lang.Object
businesslogic.AbstractBLL<Product>
businesslogic.ProductBLL
public class ProductBLL
extends AbstractBLL<Product>

Various product business logic

    • createProduct

      public int createProduct​(Product newProduct)

      Tries to validate a product and, if the product is valid, makes call to insert it into database

      Parameters:
      newProduct - product to be added to database
      Returns:
      inserted product id

    • editProduct

      public boolean editProduct​(Product toUpdate)

      Tries to validate a product and, if the client is valid, makes call to update an existing product from database

      Parameters:
      toUpdate - product to be updated
      Returns:
      boolean value representing success or fail

    • searchProduct

      public Product searchProduct​(int productId)

      Makes call to search a product in database

      Parameters:
      productId - id of the product to be searched
      Returns:
      the found product or null

    • searchProduct

      public Product searchProduct​(java.lang.String productName)

      Makes call to search a product in database

      Parameters:
      productName - name of the product to be searched
      Returns:
      the found product or null

      Parameters:
      productId - id of the product to be removed
      Returns:
      boolean value representing success or fail

    • viewProducts

      public java.util.ArrayList<Product> viewProducts()

      Makes call to select all the products from database

      Returns:
      a list of all the products existing in database

    • getPrice

      Returns the price of the desired product

      Parameters:
      productId - desired product
      Returns:
      price product

    • decrementStock

      public void decrementStock​(int productId, int usedAmount)

      Decrements the stock of a product with an amount

      Parameters:
      productId - desired product
      usedAmount - amount the stock will be decremented with
